headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Pegassi Torero
content: As any historian will tell you, the Pegassi Torero marked a paradigm shift. Gone were the sensible aerodynamics, the concessions to everyday use, the vague pretense that you were going to obey the speed limit – to be replaced with avant-garde stylings, a complete disregard for practicality, and bone-splintering performance. History is written by the winners, and there’s only one way to be on the right side.
